title: Is a nation state defined by its values? - Quora

response.answer_text: I suppose I'll ask our friends to elaborate on the values of the following nation states picked at random: ( I'm deliberately leaving Africa and Australia, no particular reason though) USA, CANADA,UK, SCOTLAND, SWEDEN, SPAIN, FRANCE, GERMANY, ITALY, SAUDI ARABIA, EGYPT, IRAN, TURKEY, RUSSIA, CHINA, PAKISTAN, NORTH KOREA, JAPAN, SOUTH KOREA, MALAYSIA, THAILAND. After which we will see HINDUSTAN-India
